column4: Is anyone having trouble with the NVIDIA drivers for Ubuntu 8.10 / 9.04?
What graphics card do you have?
I have an 8800 GTS. (2 of them). Whenever I install the restricted drivers (from Ubuntu or from the website), GDM can't start. =(
have a look in /var/log/Xorg.0.log .. if it fails there should be an error in there
